events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position through our online portal, demonstrating strong interest in the role.
After review, the application was categorized under Engineering due to keywords like software developer and experience in devops.
A recruiter with expertise in technical roles was assigned to the candidate to ensure tailored support during the hiring process.
The initial phone screening went well, with discussion focused on the candidate's experience in software development and devops practices.
The candidate promptly responded with enthusiasm confirming availability for the next stage of the interview process.
A technical interview with the engineering team was scheduled to evaluate the candidate’s software engineering skills in detail.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, impressing the panel with their problem-solving and coding abilities.
HR interview was scheduled to discuss the candidate's alignment with company culture and to review benefits and policies.
Candidate completed the HR interview expressing enthusiasm about joining the company and understanding the growth opportunities.
An offer was proposed including a competitive salary package and benefits, reflecting the candidate’s skills and experience.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about possibly joining the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer, confirming their commitment to join and contribute to the software engineering department.
The candidate began onboarding, completing necessary paperwork and introductions to key team members in the engineering division.
The hiring process was successfully closed after the candidate’s first week, with all documentation and setup completed.
